org.jerkar.api.tooling
Class JkCodeWriterForBuildClass

java.lang.Object
  org.jerkar.api.tooling.JkCodeWriterForBuildClass

public class JkCodeWriterForBuildClass
extends java.lang.Object

Provides facilities to create code source for Build class. This is mainly intended for scaffolding or migration purpose.

Method Summary
 void addGroupVersionVariable(java.lang.String group, java.lang.String version)
          When generating versionProvider method, if you want that the all the moduleId for a given group map to a variable (instead of the version literal), add an entry to this map as groupVersionVariableMap.put("my.group", "myGroupVersion") where "myGroupVersion" is a a field declared in publicFieldString
 java.lang.String endClass()
          Returns the last "}" that close the class.
static java.util.List<java.lang.String> importsForJkBuild()
          Returns the java code portion that declares imports for a basic build class extending JkBuild

The dependencies declared in the generated build class. Set it to null to not generate #dependencies method.

The repositories declared in the generated build class.

JkCodeWriterForBuildClass

public JkCodeWriterForBuildClass()
Method Detail

addGroupVersionVariable

public void addGroupVersionVariable(java.lang.String group,
                                    java.lang.String version)
When generating versionProvider method, if you want that the all the moduleId for a given group map to a variable (instead of the version literal), add an entry to this map as groupVersionVariableMap.put("my.group", "myGroupVersion") where "myGroupVersion" is a a field declared in publicFieldString

importsForJkJavaBuild

public static java.util.List<java.lang.String> importsForJkJavaBuild()
Returns the java code portion that declares imports for a basic build class extending JkJavaBuild
